langModel

Interface Vocabulary

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyVocabulary

    public interface Vocabulary
    Interface Vocabulary: interface to represent the vocabulary associated to a language model (it can be made of words or characters).
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2015)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addWord(java.lang.String word)
      Method adding a word to the vocabulary.
      boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
      Method testing if the word is present in the vocabulary.
      int getSize()
      Getter of the size of the vocabulary
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getWords()
      Method returning the list of words of the vocabulary.
      void readVocabularyFile(java.lang.String filePath)
      Method reading a vocabulary from a file containing one word per line.
      void removeWord(java.lang.String word)
      Method removing a word from the vocabulary.
      void scanNgramSet(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ngramSet)
      Method parsing the given set of n-grams and, for each n-gram, listing its words and adding them to the vocabulary.
      void writeVocabularyFile(java.lang.String filePath)
      Method writing a vocabulary to a file with one word per line.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Getter of the size of the vocabulary
        Returns:
        the number of words in the vocabulary.

      • getWords

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getWords()
        Method returning the list of words of the vocabulary.
        Returns:
        the words of the vocabulary.

      • contains

        boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
        Method testing if the word is present in the vocabulary.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to consider.
        Returns:
        true if the word is in the vocabulary, else otherwise.

      • addWord

        void addWord(java.lang.String word)
        Method adding a word to the vocabulary.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to add.

      • removeWord

        void removeWord(java.lang.String word)
        Method removing a word from the vocabulary.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to remove.

      • scanNgramSet

        void scanNgramSet(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ngramSet)
        Method parsing the given set of n-grams and, for each n-gram, listing its words and adding them to the vocabulary. The set of n-grams can come from the set of grams present in a NgramCounts.
        Parameters:
        ngramSet - the set of n-grams whose words to add to the vocabulary.

      • readVocabularyFile

        void readVocabularyFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Method reading a vocabulary from a file containing one word per line.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the file containing the vocabulary.

      • writeVocabularyFile

        void writeVocabularyFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Method writing a vocabulary to a file with one word per line.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the file o contain the vocabulary.
